name: Nacho's Scavenger Hunt
description:
Sweet Home and Personal Living is a peaceful retirement home. The support dog who resides there is Nacho. Play as Nacho who wants to make sure his elderly patrons are taken care of.  Run, jump, crouch through objects to reach the items Nacho seeks. Maybe find a bone or two.

Includes:

  • An easy and outgoing experience
  • A cute, eyecatching art style
  • Catchy music that's pleasing to the ears
